loginchat.config.serverslist.desc: List of servers on which the mod is enabled
loginchat.config.messageslist.desc: List of the messages the mod should send at the start of the session. May contain commands, those should start with a /.
loginchat.config.singleplayer.desc: Should the mod send the messages, specified in the messages list, at the start of the singleplayer session?
loginchat.config.delay.desc: The amount of time in milliseconds that will pass since joining the server or the world before the chat messages you specified in the config will be sent
